title: 293: Complaining with Matt Bellassai
itunes:title: 293: Complaining with Matt Bellassai
description:
The Broads are joined by the hilarious comedian and king of complaining, Matt Bellassai! They chat about a wide spectrum of fears and complaints and opinions involving dentists, dating apps, shop lifting, and more - and, of course, go on many laughing tangents! They also discuss some of the pet peeves and complaints that the #broadsquad sent in - spoiler alert: they agree deeply with some and disagree intensely with others! 

***Join The Broads THURSDAY for their recap of Bachelor in Paradise episodes 2 & 3

MATT BELLASSAI: 
Check out his podcast “Unhappy Hour” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/unhappy-hour-with-matt-bellassai/id1253622346

Follow him on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/mattbellassai/

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***OMAX OSHOT: go to OSHOTCBD.COM and use code CHATTY to get 20% off O-SHOT sitewide! 

***KIWI CO: Get your first month free on select crates at KIWICO.COM/CHATTY

***JUNESHINE: Receive 20% off PLUS free shipping SITEWIDE at JUNESHINE.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY at checkout to claim this deal!

***FLEX FIT: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits - or 10% off your first 10% off your first Flex Cup - PLUS free US shipping!

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
